content.detailedDescription:
I have a deer feeder about 20 yards behind my patio.  i also have a motion detector deer camera.  i noticed the following two pictures spaced 16 seconds apart on the camera on 5/18/10.  

the first appears to be some type of fireball/flash that totall engulfed the feeder even though there was no bad weather that night. above the fireball are the points of what appear to be two slender lights spaced approximately 20 feet or so apart as if they were being projected down from above.  

the second picture taken at 3:46 a.M. appears to have the fireball rising above the feeder and the two slender lights moving almost totally above and out of the picture...Again as if ascending upward.

i am familiar with ufos to a certain degree and this probably doesn't qualify as a ufo event, but it is a very mysterious thing to me.

i am happy to visit with anyone if  they want to visit further about these attached pictures.
content.summary: Fireball and cone-like lights over a deer feeder

content.detailedDescription:
While driving east on state route 715 in wolfe county, kentucky at between 10:30 and 11:00 pm on thursday march 3rd 2011, i witnessed a quick, bright, green streak coming down in the northeast sky.  
the event lasted approximately two seconds.  
i can't say how long the trail was but it dissipated quickly.
i didn't hear any unusual sounds during the event.  my vehicle windows were closed. i was driving at an approximate speed of fifty mph.
i witnessed this event through the windshield. 
i can't remember if it was cloudy or not but it was clear with no rain or snow. 
i saw no other anomalous in the sky that night.
i first took the falling green light to be a meteorite, thus the reason in the delayed reporting of it.
content.summary: Witnessed possible meteorite in northeast sky between 10:30 and 11:00 pm event lasted approximately two seconds

thank you,
*(wit's name removed--cms/sg)
satsuma, alabama
content.summary: Alabama ufo 2007

content.detailedDescription: My brother-in-law and i were fishing for crappie on some land i lived on near macdona, tx. it was about 3:45 am in the morning when i noticed a very large circle of bright light running along the ground. david my brother-in-law notice at about the same time. he said what the devil is that? the light was a large circle of light, but did not have a shaft of light running down to it. it was roaming all over the ground around us at though it was searching for something.  when we looked up at the trees about 75 feet away from us and across the dirty road leading to the property we was a huge disc shape craft. we could only see the shape of it at first with the night sky light by the moon. as i remember. then the craft came over the top of us. it was close enough i stood on a dirt mound and touched it. it was cold to the touch and it was smooth and black in color. there were no lights that we could see coming from the craft. we did have out coleman lantern with us and could see it above us. it blocked out the whole night sky. nothing but the black bottom of the craft could be seen. when i touched it i got a feeling of a presents but not one of someone who was benevolent, but of someone that did not have our best interest in mind. i turned and looked and my brother-in-law seemed to be frozen in place in mid stride. i was not affected by the craft and i held out my hand to warn it to leave. when i did that i felt a energy flow from my hand toward the craft. it seem to be pushed back by the energy flowing from my hand. it felt very odd to say the least. about the same time a voice came out of me like the sound of thunder. it told the craft to leave and leave now. i do not know where the voice came form and i have not heard it since this sighting. the craft went straight up into the night sky when no sound what so ever and disappeared without a trace. when i looked over had my  brother-in-law he looked shaken and he said to me that he never wanted to talk about it. my now ex brother-in-law is a professor at smu and felt it would hurt his reputation to talk about such a thing. so i never have reported it until now. what got me to do so was my son was visiting my brother-in-law and asked him about it. my son thought i was not telling the truth and made it up for some reason. but when my brother-in-law told him it really happened my son called me and talked about it for a long time.  so now i am telling you. regards, *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg). ps. **(2nd wit's name deleted--cms/sg) still does not want to be public about this issue. you can contact me *(wit's name deleted) and i can talk to david and see if he wishes to talk to you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Black 300 foot disc over the tree line on my property near macdona, tx

content.detailedDescription: This did not happen to me it happened to my son and my father inlaw. they were out hunting at my father inlaws duck club out along the san fransisco bay right next to the mothball fleet on jan 1,2010 it was sometime in the afternoon when my son said he saw an orange glowing cylinder shaped object with three spikes on top come zooming by out of nowhere then kinda hovered for a second then went down he thinks into the water he couldnt see it when it went down he assumes it went into the water of the bay right next to the fleet the only reason im sending you this email is because we were watching a show on the tv and saw your program about the fayetteville incident and i saw the picture of the ufo and it looked like what my son had described i even did a drawing of it for him to put on his wall because i didnt believe him but i saw your show and now i believe him...
content.summary: Orange glowing cylinder with spikes.

content.detailedDescription: As i have sent you photo's before,i am crying out for help.I'm not a crazy or trying to play with anyone.My hoppy is captureing image's out of our clouds/skys.While i have been captureing image's,i have also discovered ufo's.As the image's are getting stronger,i have captured ufo's also.I will send one photo of the ufo and an image i believe isn't just an image.I need to show an expert my stuff,then you will understand why i am trying to warn all.I do not know if we are in danger or what is going on.I do know one thing,something magical is going on in our skys.Please do not disrecard what i am saying.I not only have captured objects in our clouds/skys,i have also discovered the unamagenable.These image's create magic.Some of the ufo's i keep captureing spit out these circle shaped objects that spit out image's i have captured.You must see to believe.As i try to find the words to discripe my theory,i most find somebody out there that will listen.As i do show a few friends,family and co-workers,i also tell a few of them what i see,what i have visioned,what as happened to me since may 5th, 2010.I have actually told a few people about earthquake storms i have visioned on the west coast about 4 months ago.I do know there are ufo's,i have photo proof.In the (wolverton(ufo) photo,i see the silver ufo by the light,then there is an object above it(top of photo)then in the 0316111242[1],i see the cigar shape(under the light)then 0317111233j[1](right side of photo)i see a side view of a mans face looking toward the light,while there is other image's in this photo also.You should see what happens,unamagenable
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cone,   Square,   Rectagular
content.summary: They are getting stronger,there in our skys.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out walking my dog when i turned around outside my house and observed an oval orange light in the clear sky, i initially thought as always that it was a plane or helicopter, however the light was orange and steady which made me then think different, i started walking towards it and it got brighter and was slowly moving towards me, however it was still up in the sky, it then stopped and started retreating into the atmosphere and within 2 seconds it had turned into a pinhole in the sky and vanished.

i have never experienced anything like this and it really has me thinking.
content.summary: Bright orange light in sky, moved towards me and got brighter then turned and vanished into sky

content.detailedDescription: I was experimenting in near infra-red.  taping some  strange clouds, what many call chemclouds.  i was using 1000nanometer filter and was unaware at the time, what was in the shot here.  after analyzing the footage, i discovered a few neat anomalies.  a small "blinker" and a small watcher.  i estimated this cloud to be 7000 feet, so these orbs whould have appeared small at that distance. they are generally the size ofa basketball at close range. either way, neat footage.  there are alot of neat little critters in these clouds, especially in the 680 nm range.  i have alot of this footage to analyze but not much time.  all i know is that i havent seen the discs of old, but alot of "fake" planes.  it looks like they changed it up on us bigtime.  these things are flying everywhere.  i think you need to put "fake plane" on the mufon site as a choice for sighting.  i would be checking the box alot.  i leftmy name, ifyou would like to learn more please contact me.  this phenomenon is now solved, and documented.  thank you. **(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg). here is the video link.  i am not on my video computer and can't upload.  thanks.
content.summary: Blinking orbs in chemcloud *(info moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

content.detailedDescription:
We left my girlfriends mothers house between 7:00pm and 7:10 arizona time.

proceeded down 36th avenue harmont drive
to
northern avenue
turned right onto northern
heading towards 75th avenue and northern.

right around 

56th avenue and northern
glendale, az 85301

sometime between 7:15 and 7:30pm arizona time

i looked out of my drivers side window and noticed a triangle shaped craft, flying at fairly low, much lower than i have seen planes normally fly.

it had two bright white lights positioned at each end of the backend
and what looked like a red flashing light between them near the bottom of the craft.

by time i told my girlfriend to look, it was to far away to make out any detail but you could still see the lights on the back. so it was moving fairly fast but at a steady speed no darting or "jumping."

i am not sure exactly what it was, just want to see if anyone has seen anything like it.
content.summary: Driving home from gf's mothers house, noticed a fast steady paced moved triangle craft out of drivers side window

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i saw thath boy taking some pictures of the sky, that was the moment when we looked at the sky to find 10-15 red ligths becoming to orange. those ligths were moving slowly and at the same time were to line up in shape of arrow.

15 minutes before 9pm, those orange arrow desapear slowly in the sky.

it was incredible!!!
content.summary: Red ligths making shapes in the sky of méxico

content.detailedDescription: Was in my backyard at 7;45 pm and looked in the sky at the stars when i saw a triangled shaped object go slowly across the sky from east to west. it had a center light with two other lights on either side forming a triangle.It was not blinking like an airplane would be. there was no noise at all! it lasted for about 3 minutes. i was shocked and could not move,very surprised.
content.summary: Saw triangle shaped ufo going slow across the sky from east to west,no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was walking in the park in south of ramat-gan. by a sudden impulse i lifted my head into the sky and saw an orange circulare light. it didnt move for about 3 minutes. then it begun to fall very very rapidly. looked like it crashed on the nighborhood near the park, but there was no sound nor people in panoc. i went near th the falling place. and nothing was heard of in the local papers or news. looked like it had just dissapered!
content.summary: In israel ramat gan. saw orange light in the sky. it didnt move after 5 minutes it fell

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i was driving to work. it was 6:40am and as we were approaching schaumburg going north on i-290. my wife wakes me up as we get close to the higgins road exit. she quickly looked out the window since she was driving and said what is that. at first i could not see it but when see said look over at the building, we saw an object completely stationairy over 2 buildings. the location of these buliding would be on the other side of i- 290 south bound across the street from higgins rd next to the streets of woodfield. the building building are made of that shiny glass.

anyway the object was frozen in mid-air. it was floating maybe 25 - 50 feet from the taller of the 2 buildings but was frozen still over the smaller building. its shape to me look it was rectagular from the side with a mark or line going in the middle. on the front end of it there was a pulsating light which would travel back and forth from 2 points.

my wife from what she saw described it as triangular shaped. she said it resembeled a tripod. the height wise from top to bottom it was about an inch and a half if measured from a distance with are thumb give or take. she feels it was triangular  because the red pulsating light would only would only travel back and forth from only 2 of its edges. the red light was not blinking it stayed on and would shine brightly when it would hit one edge point then dim slightly travel back to the other point and blink again.

i looked all over i saw airplanes taking off with there headlight appearing whitish yellow so it wasnt a plane i saw at that distance no plane could stay perfectly still. it wasnt a helicopter because again helicopters move and you can hear them. plus the lights on a helicopter blink they do not pulsate traveleing in a line.

so me and my wife called a friend immediately afterwards and told him what we saw. we were just amazed that we got to see something like that. we drove off the exit it was close to work time we didnt wanna be late. we rushed to the fifth floor to see if we could maybe see it from our building but another building blocked the view. later after work we drove by those building when going home. i looked at the roof of the buliding to try and debunk it. maybe construction extended lamps off roof but there was nothing there that could have produced that image.
content.summary: Frozen in mid air with a red pulsating light

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out on my patio at the time of the sighting smoking a cigarette and my wife was standing on the steps that lead down to the patio, but under the eve of the house.  i just happened to look up into the sky, as i often do to watch the stars and the occasional jet inbound to offut airforce base or epply airfield.  within a couple of seconds of looking into the sky, i say the triangle shapped object.  it was moving fairly slowly and approx. 500 ft to maybe 1,000 in the air.  i relate the height to the height of the large power poles with have in the park area behind our house.  there was no noise associated with this object!  also, there was a reddish-orange hue that seemed to trace the outline of the object.  i also could faintly make out some rough yet unknown marking on the bottom of the object.  there were no blinking lights.  there was just the hue to it.  i did started to tell my wife to look..Look at that...What is that?  she kept saying...What...What?  i would point into the sky but by the time she walked down the stairs and onto the patio, the object had passed far enough north that the object was behind the roof line of our house.  that oddest thing was the no noise and hue of the object.  no blinking lights.  any plane flying that low would be moving much...Much faster that this object was.  the movement was very smooth and in a straight line from south to north.
content.summary: Moved south to north.  no sound.  red and orange hue around outside of object.

content.detailedDescription: My friend's mom, debbie harman, and i were walking out of her apartment so she could take me home, when i spotted a bright orange light floating in the sky. i pointed it out to debbie, she said it was more then likely a helicopter, she is not a believer of the extra terrestrials. i persistently said it was hovering in the same place for about a minute, so we got in her car, and drove by it on preilipp rd. near clinton keith rd. off of the 15 fwy in wildomar, ca. it was hovering over an open field of grass. we parked on the side of the road, and i got out to take a picture with her camera phone. it was dome shaped at the top, and on the bottom was a really bright orange light, and when i say bottom i mean the bottom of the craft, not like a light on a plane, it looked centered on the craft kind of like the ufo's in movies, it was hovering, and i was distracted by the picture, debbie pointed out to me, that it looked like static was shooting from the bottom, at the same time as it was dropping objects into the field. i focused on it, and sure enough, it was hovering and dropping what looked like little charcoal grey boxes into the field. it started floating away horizontally to the left hand side of the santa rosa apartments, and what struck me as strange was there was no sound coming from the craft and it was moving very slowly, much too slow to be a plane and too quiet to be a helicopter or jet or any kind of conventional man made air craft, so she insisted that we follow the object, so we made a right turn onto inland valley drive, where the object was no where to be found, it almost seemed like it disappeared within 3 seconds of making a turn. we continued to look for it, and could not find it anymore. later on that day (in the daylight hours, the sighting was at around midnight) i walked the field with my cousin thomas nielson to search for any kind of debris or evidence but found none. the picture that i am sending is a cellphone image, altered with a night vision setting on picnik.Com i thought that the shape was odd and i'm upset that the picture did not come out better but this is what we have to work with, though it is still interesting. remember, cellphone cameras tend to have a hard time picking up light, but it still picked up..
content.summary: Dome shaped craft with light emitting from bottom, dropping objects. moved horizontally and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
We were about 20 miles from roads end to the mt. st. helens overlook when we pulled over to get some water out of a pond at the base of a rock cliff 
with a small water fall trickeling into the pond.  as i walked towards the cliff i could here the water fall, then everything went dead , no sound and the air was dead like.  then i noticed this strange wispy fog streaming by the rock wall. and the water wasent falling any more.
    i thought this was verry strange, so i looked up the road and there was a river comeing down the vally but it was turned to a heavy smoke looking stream now. so i looked up and there was a thick fog layer 200 ft. above us and i noticed that there was a perfect round hole in the fog above us and i could see the stars, then i noticed this one star started to move in a eratic hexagon pattern real fast then stop. then it did it agin , this went on for several min.  it was definetly verry far away out in space. all of a sudden i saw a beam of light comeat me from the distance
i got scared and i knew it was not from earth. then it materialized at the opening above me. the whole place lit up like daylight but it was a wierd light, the trees looked funny. then i could see the ufo 200ft. above my headwith these beautiful blue & red tiny lights rotateing around the rim of the ship, acolor like nothing i ever seen before.  my girl frind was sitting in the car , i told her to look at it several times , she just sat there like she was paralized, then the ufo took off so fast it was gone. the hole in the fog closed up and everything returned to normal. i wish it would of stayed, i had a feeling of perfect content while it was there. i felt abondond and left out when it left. i discovered a strange lump under my sholder blade. they may of abducted me , i see ther faces and close up of the edge of the light of the ufo sometimes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw ufo on road to mt. st. helens

content.detailedDescription:
Pulled to side of highway near mankato, began filming numerous ufos.  they are traveling as our aircraft. they can be seen day or night.  this short clip is representation of the phenomenon.  the object which appears as a star, i call a watcher.  this object flew closer and closer, until becoming stationary.  numerous blinkers flew quite close to the watcher.  this is one clip, displaying what to look for.  these are very numerous.  they are pretending to be planes in the dayling.  at night they are watchers and blinkers.  they are tricky, and are usually found above my house on an clear night.

they are quite adept at the "plane" deception, but are full of anomalies in the near infra read.  they emmit ufos in broad daylight.  these are what is known as "chemplanes."  they are the same entities that once traveled as discs.  they are now planes, choppers, watchers, and sprayers. they are manipulating the climate.  for sure.  if you want to see the anomalies i speak of look on (*link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg) on youtube.  i think i am ready to meet, if you are still interested.  i feel the puzzle has been solved.  i am confident i know what these are and what they are doing.  the word needs to get out fast.  thank you.
content.summary: Witnessed numerous ufos short period of time

content.detailedDescription: No noise, slowly moving east while slowly rotating. i looked at the sky to see the clouds.  it was directly above the parking lot of blue cross in topeka, ks.  at first, i thought it was a model airplane, but i have never seen one like that before.  i was at work on my lunch break at about 11:50 a.M. during may or june of 2002.  a few years later, i realized i saw a ufo.  has anyone else seen this ufo?  e-mail:  *(email address deleted--cms/sg)/.
content.summary: Yellow/orange

content.detailedDescription:
I only noticed this object last saturday , when i scanned the picture to put inside my computer and on the net . i have had several sightseeings at this place , but this is the only evidence i captured , "accidentally" , because my mom took the picture and i was with my back towards the event . i really believe it���s possible to be an ufo , because i lived at this place 6 months of my life , and i know this place very well . it could not be a weather ballon , because right after this picture ( 20 seconds ) , it was taken another picture and the object was not there anymore . this place ( sana -- a district of the city of maca��� ) is 130 km from rio de janeiro , it���s a rural area , with very low population and it is famous to be a sightseeing place , as i said , i have had many sightseeings at this place .

i would really like this picture to be analysed by experts , and just in case , i have the original one and looks just the same , taken by a non digital camera .

hope to hear from you soon , thanks for your atention , because i have sent this pictures to many brazilian net sites and got no answer .

when my mom took the picture , i was at a desert site , with no houses at my sightseeing , going to a desert waterfall .

the first time i noticed the object i was pretty sure it was an ufo , just like i said before , i noticed it 2 and a half years after the event , last saturday , when i was scanning the picture .
content.summary: Dark gray spheric ( round ) object , close to my right shoulder , deep in the picture

content.detailedDescription: I was pushing snow berms with a d5 dozer started work about 4:00am it was about 5:13am when i see this red light buy the end of the runway thought it was a snow machine tail light but it was moving slow and smooth like it was flooting i turned off my lights and watched it for about 1 minit cross the frozen lake and shoot up in the sky.It got a little bigger and was in the sky for about 20sec and it had this twinkel and a glow around it,then it disapered for a few sec reapeered a few more sec and it was gone.I called my wife on the phone told her what happened and she told me to go home so i did
content.summary: Snow removal around runway.I was driving the dozer when i knowtest a red light about 300ft from me.I thought it was the taik light of a snow machine with no head light ,it was to smooth like it was flooting i watched it cross the frozen lake shoot up in

content.detailedDescription:
at 11 am on march 4th i was walking from my home to a local coffee shop 3 blocks away. looking up into the clear blue sky i noticed a bright starlike object  at about 10 oclock high and towards the north.  i remember the sun was behind me towards the southern sky. 
what struck me is that it was completely still and did not appear to move in the 15 to 20 minutes i looked at it. after pointing it out to a local person from my town  i decided to walk back to my car where my canon 20 d camera was.  i had already taken a few pics from my i phone but did not believe they showed the object which was about the size of a large star.  i  then started to take several pics keeping in mind to include the corner of a building or power lines  for comparison to scale and focus. the object was silent and appeared to me to be within our atmosphere and like a round silver white star in a bright daytime sky.
 i sterted to walk back to the coffee shop keeping my eye on the object the entire time.  at the coffee shop i asked two people to come out and view it.  they were also stumped as to what the object could be?  it was silent and stationary.   after a little while i noticed it started to move towards the east and over nyc.  there were some thin clouds forming and eventually it moved over nyc and disappeared behind the clouds.  the entire sighting lasted a little more than an hour.
content.summary: bright white shining object stationary in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was outside to a cig i was facing south looked up there was an airplane just passing bye heading due east i turned to my right looking due west noticed a very bright orange light traveling due south east so i reached inside the door grabed my little binoculars i observed this object moving through the sky could not make out any shape just a bright ball of light.Conditon of skies hazey with some high thin clouds i watched this object for approx.30 seconds then it just simply was gone !
content.summary: Object was taveling south e it was bright ornge altatude appox 1500 ft

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking late afternoon; in applehill on hiddenvalley lane. a partly sunny and cloudy day. i am a skywatcher all my life. this is my 3rd. sighting in my lifetime. all have been daytime sightings. i am a 48 year old woman. was heading back to the car and looked up and there was a circle at a fairly high altitude; but i could still make out a clear shape.It was a circle/disk shape that just stayed there. it made no noise. i said to myself; wow here's another ufo again! i felt like it could see me also. i stared at it for a good minute to 2 minutes at the most and then it literally disapeared. it did not move to take off; it just like it was gone. a few minutes later a jet flew about the same altitude; but it had wings; tail; tip; ect. and had the "aftersound" of a jet. the ufo made no noise whatsoever.
my first sighting was at about the age of 10. it was in sacramento; cal. and was a disk with what appeared to be windows; but could have been just the shape and design. i was with my friend susan. she also remembers it till this day.
the sighting before this recent one was about 6 years ago. in placerville calif. a 15 minute drive from apple hill. we were driving right off hwy 50; my daughter and i both saw this one and pulled the car over and got out. and we said do you see what i see?..At a low/medium altitude were two disks side by side. plain as day. it' was about an hour before dark. they made no noise either. then faded out of sight or disapeared; it was hard to tell. this was near the intersection of forni rd. and hwy 50.
i just found a verse in the bible. i am a christian...People always ask me wow how come i never see anything like that; and i may have found the answer...Jesus said; i am not of this world!
i found this in the bible in ii kings chapter 6 verses 16; 17; 18
and he answered; fear not for "they" be with us; are more than they that be with them; and elisha prayed; and said; lord; i pray thee; open his eyes that he may see. and the lord opened his eyes of the young man;and he saw:and behold; the mountain was full of horses and chariots of fire round about elisha!!! and when they came down to him; elisha prayed unto the lord; and said; smite this people with blindness; and he smote them with blindness according to the word of elisha...
you should read the whole chapter.
that same chapter also talks about an axe falling into the water; and the iron did swim!!! (anti-gravity) the who bible is full of clouds that talk; take up jesus; glow at night and a pillar by day; ect... it goes on and on.
jesus when he accended into the "clouds" said he would be back the way he accended; all the signs are here that jesus said the world condition would be.One of the signs is"signs from the sky"!!!
i believe ufo's are angels; good and bad...As in demons or fallen angels; and the guardian angels that modern man talks about; comes from a verse that says; i will give my angels charge round about you ;to guard you in all your ways!
i believe; because of the ii kings chapter 6 that only certain people can see them. that they may be there all the time..And maybe the walk in apple hill were my angels watching out for me and telling me that they are here and not to worry.
read that bible...All  you ufo folks! enjoy.
content.summary: Walking my dogs in apple hill orchards in camino california; saw ufo at high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 7:15 to 7:30 pm tonight, i had just let the dogs out in the backyard, and i went and sat out in front where i have some benches under my front porch canopy area.  from there i can see 1/4 of my valley here with no houses blocking the view.  the sky here is very clear, and i was looking at a constellation directly in front of my view, up in the sky. that constellation appears west, from my vantage point, of what appears to be the little dipper.  so, as i was looking at this constellation, i suddenly noticed a flashing white light.  i looked at it then noticed two more blinking white lights.  i realized, as i had seen once before out here, that it seemed like 3 lights forming a gigantic black craft, accentuated by the lights.  i ran inside and got my cheap video camera, and went out to film the lights (nothing showed up as i later viewed the video).  i will consider this one giant object as opposed to individual lights, based on how they were moving.  the 3 lights blinked erratically and moved at the same time as the others, and then i noticed a fourth light, no sound coming from the object, and with the fourth light in view, it appeared at this point to be an isoscoles trapezoid.  a rectangle with the bottom half larger than the upper half.  this object was not very high in the sky, and would have looked like stars unless you were watching it for more than a second, as i was, and it was gigantic.
 
i would say, holding my hand at arm's length, the entire object was twice the size of my hand from that view, at least.  so i would guess it was the size of several football fields.  it flew relatively slowly, and it came from the west and headed east.  i watched and tried to film it for about 4 minutes until it was out of my view.  it appeared low in the sky, at about the height of the helicopter which often lands at the nearby hospital, so it was not high up at all, from what i could tell, and it was probably only several blocks away from my house, directly over the school area.  i tried to point out to a neighbor who was driving by to look up, but the car kept going.  no one else was around.  it is amazing to see these lights, blinking erratically but moving in the same direction simultaneously, on some kind of gigantic craft.
content.summary: 4 lights in the shape of an isoscoles trapezoid flew over the local high school, the white lights blinking irregularly, heading west to east, flying low and slow with no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo sighting over i-5 capitol city freeway interchange - two ufo's were sighted at approximately 1940 hrs flying at approximately 1500' agl in se direction.  one ufo was first sighted moving at approx 200 knots and then slowed to a near stationary position and quickly joined by second craft, both craft increasing velocity and executing lateral and vertical turns at high speed with no degree of bank or loss of airspeed and executed vertical and diving maneuvers before departing vertically in high speed vertical helical maneuver, both  craft spinning around each other.  both craft changed color with acceleration in climb and dive from brilliant white, to turquoise green and red before disappearing into high vertical cloud. i have 25 years experience as a flight crew member in the air force flying throughout the world.  i am certain that these were not winged or rotary aircraft.  no sound was heard by me as i was travelling in an suv.  craft were observed in late twilight conditions of near perfect visibility due to clear air from departing storms.
content.summary: While proceeding thru interchange i5 capitol city fwy i observed first one than two flying craft executing high speed and stopping maneuvers while airborne.

content.detailedDescription:
Okay, so i was out going to pick up a friend to get a trampoline at a store called "sam's club", i was loading up the truck with the trampoline when i took a break for a second when i looked up then there it was. i saw  large triangle in the sky with  a large light in the middle, 3 lights on the outside, and a small flare out the back. i thought it was a  flying low but then realized how slow it was going. when i told my friend to look up he didn't believe me, when he finally looked up it vanished. i had no reaction to the mysterious object other than more proof that there is life out there.
i always carried a camera with me after that sighting, next time i will get footage with my 1080p camera.
content.summary: Large, large light in the middle, 3 lights on the outside, small flare out the back.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my kitchen washing dishes when there was a very loud sound outside overhead.It became louder and i could feel the house almost shake,i ran outside to see what it was and it was an extremely large disc like object that was so low just barely hovering over our house and continued on over the houses in the neighborhood.I originally thought a plane was going to crash because of the loud sound that you could  actually feel..But it very slowly just glided overhead.It was far bigger than a plane or jet and the shape was disc like but with no specific color almost appearing clear but yet you could see it was a solid shape.Most recognizable about the shape was the middle with a bright lit up triangle with multi color lights.They did not flash anywhere and the lights in the shape of the triangle always stayed lit.I watched it till it was out of sight,,then my adult son came out to see what was going on and then i told him what i saw out there and pointed to the directions from which it came and went.He then told me of this sight and this is how i came to be here telling you what i just saw.I still cannot believe what i have just experienced..I even walked back out there hoping to see it again but of course i didnt.My son asked me why i didnt call him..I explained to him that when i was out there watching it i was in such awe and couldnt take my eyes off of it.If i ran back into the house i would lose track of it.This is the first time i have seen something like this out here.My son also stated that a friend of ours saw the same exact thing with the same exact description roughly 10 years ago.I am amazed at what i just saw..Wish i could see it again..Funny i didnt feel afraid once i saw it.No photos.
content.summary: Flew over home in neighborhood very low

content.detailedDescription: Pictures where taken 4 days before nyc flap that later was dismissed as balloons, these where flying east to south east wind was from the east objects where flying into the wind keeping same altitude on magnification of darker blurs show up as large oval disc objects multiple shots where taken
content.summary: Orb, spheres

content.detailedDescription:
I was out this morning a few minutes before 6am cst looking at the stars for about 30 seconds and i noticed a triangle that went directly over our house. it was not well lit but all three points had what appeared to be rows of lights. it was so low it looked like i could almost hit it if i threw a ball at it. it was very quiet and it seemed to be gone in seconds. it went almost directly south to north. the thing is that it was real! i really didn't think it was a big deal as i thought i would just google it after work and find out why these things are flying around and see one some other time. little did i know that there is no explanation for these yet. i have never had any interest in ufo's and still would rather not see these things.

i am in my mid 40's do not drink or do drugs and i just went to the eye dr in february. i wish i would not have witnessed this as i have enough going on. i hope to just forget about it now but what the heck was it?? must be the military.....
content.summary: A triangle - not well lit, very quiet, low.
